com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots

Class PhatLoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.PhatLoot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable

    public final class PhatLoot
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable
    A PhatLoot is a reward made up of money, items, and more
    Author:
    Codisimus

      • getTimeRemaining

        public long getTimeRemaining(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                    PhatLootChest chest)
        Returns the remaining time until the PhatLootChest resets for the given Player. Returns -1 if the PhatLootChest never resets
        Parameters:
        player - The given Player
        chest - The given PhatLootChest
        Returns:
        the remaining time until the PhatLootChest resets

      • rollForChestLoot

        public boolean rollForChestLoot(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                       PhatLootChest chest,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       boolean autoSpill)
        Rolls for loot to place in the given PhatLootChest
        Parameters:
        player - The Player who is looting
        chest - The PhatLootChest that is being looted
        title - The title of the Inventory
        autoSpill - true if the Chest should spill its loot rather than placing it in the chest
        Returns:
        true if the PhatLootChest should be manually broken

      • rollForMobDrops

        public int rollForMobDrops(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity mob,
                  org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  java.util.List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> drops)
        Rolls for loot to add to the given mob drops
        Parameters:
        mob - The LivingEntity that was killed
        player - The player who killed the mob or null if the mob died of natural causes
        drops - The list of items that the mob drops
        Returns:
        The amount of experience that the mob should drop

      • reset

        public void reset(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Resets the user times for all PhatLootChests of this PhatLoot. If a Block is given, reset only that PhatLootChest
        Parameters:
        block - The given Block

      • resetForWorld

        public void resetForWorld(org.bukkit.World world)
        Resets the global loot times for all PhatLootChests of this PhatLoot within the given World.
        Parameters:
        world - The World whose loot times are to be reset
